001/**  
002 * This controller provides functionality for the manager's control over the menu and to view the menu items
003 * @author Isha Virk
004 */
005package src.controller;
006
007import src.controller.useful_functions.user_role;
008import src.model.product;
009
010import static src.controller.useful_functions.current_user_role;
011import static src.controller.useful_functions.switch_scene;
012
013import java.util.List;
014
015import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
016import javafx.fxml.FXML;
017import javafx.scene.control.Button;
018import javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent;
019import javafx.scene.layout.VBox;
020
021import src.data.product_data;
022import src.model.product;
023
024
025/**
026 * This class provides functionality for the manager's control over the menu and to view the menu items
027 */
028public class view_menu_items_controller {
029    /**
030     * This function handles the button click action to switch back to the menu page
031     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
032     */
033    @FXML
034    private void handle_back_click(ActionEvent event) {
035        switch_scene("GUI/menu_items_page.fxml", event);
036    }
037
038    /**
039     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the menu items page
040     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
041     */
042    @FXML
043    private void handle_menu_click(MouseEvent event) {
044        switch_scene("GUI/menu_items_page.fxml", event);
045    }
046
047    /**
048     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the inventory page
049     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
050     */
051    @FXML
052    private void handle_inventory_click(MouseEvent event) {
053        switch_scene("GUI/inventory_page.fxml", event);
054    }
055
056    /**
057     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the sales page
058     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
059     */
060    @FXML
061    private void handle_sales_click(MouseEvent event) {
062        switch_scene("GUI/sales_page.fxml", event);
063    }
064    
065     /**
066     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the menu items page
067     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
068     */
069    @FXML
070    private void handle_view_menu(ActionEvent event) {
071        switch_scene("GUI/view_menu_items.fxml", event);
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the add menu items page (for updating)
076     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
077     */
078    @FXML
079    private void handle_update_menu(ActionEvent event) {
080        switch_scene("GUI/add_menu_item.fxml", event);
081    }
082
083    /**
084     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the add inventory page
085     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
086     */
087    @FXML
088    private void handle_add_ing(ActionEvent event) {
089        switch_scene("GUI/add_inventory.fxml", event);
090    }
091
092    /** The FXML container for the drinks */
093    @FXML private VBox drink_container;
094
095
096    /** The FXML container for the toppings */
097    @FXML private VBox topping_container;
098
099
100    /**
101     * This function dynamically fetches the drinks and toppings from the database
102     * to populate the FXML containers
103     */
104    @FXML
105    public void initialize() {
106
107        //Topping Button Insertion and Handler
108        List<product> toppings = product_data.getToppings();
109        for (product topping : toppings) {
110            Button btn = new Button(topping.getProductName());
111            btn.setMaxWidth(Double.MAX_VALUE);
112            topping_container.getChildren().add(btn);
113        }
114
115        //Drink Button Insertion and Handler
116        List<product> drinks = product_data.getDrinks();
117        for (product drink : drinks) {
118            Button drinkBtn = new Button(drink.getProductName());
119            drinkBtn.setMaxWidth(Double.MAX_VALUE);
120            // btn.setOnAction(e -> handleToppingSelection(topping)); // on click should show drink and ingredients
121            drink_container.getChildren().add(drinkBtn);
122        }
123    }
124}
